If only Riot would actually care about her, it's been 1071 days already since her last skin came out. Of course that doesn't mean any of those concepts are short of amazing.
bump
Lissandra Cassiopeia and Kennen need new skins
yeah , the thing is that liss and cass have so much potential for amazing skins , idk about kennen
Liss is fine for skins. The champs who desperately need new skins are Kennen, Nocturne, Swain, and Cassiopeia. Respectively, 5, 4, 4, and 3 years since receiving their last skins.

I dont see why Liss is fine here , Lissandra didnt get a skin for 2 years as well , and she only have 2 skins (both ugly) , while those you have listed : Nocturne 5 skins (1 legendary) Kennen 5 skins Swain 3 skins Cassiopeia 4 skins , all more than Lissandra and better skins .

> [{quoted}](name=SiriusxBlack,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=Zph27PGA,comment-id=0017000000000001,timestamp=2016-01-17T17:41:39.200+0000)
>
> I dont see why Liss is fine here , Lissandra didnt get a skin for 2 years as well , and she only have 2 skins (both ugly) , while those you have listed : Nocturne 5 skins (1 legendary) Kennen 5 skins Swain 3 skins Cassiopeia 4 skins , all more than Lissandra and better skins .

They've all been around longer than Lissa by literally years.

Honestly, the time between skin releases doesnt bother me, but only the potential for good ones.

I agree with on on all but nocturne, because the only thing i can think of is a pool party skin where he is made out of steam from a hot tub, and since it really isnt a good idea, he doesnt need one
Cassiopeia hasn't received a new skin in 3 years.
haha i made a post about a volcanic cass skin a longgg time back i really like the idea
The problem is she kinda needs a gameplay update, badly. Imagine if they made a new skin, then they had to redo all the FX and some animations a few patches later.
I think she's fine
New Year/ Warring Kingdoms Cassio looks like it has a lot of potential, being true to the legend as well as a New Year Revel coming up.
Dat warring kingdoms....
I love the War Kingdom one!

That freaken War Kingdom skin / White Snake skin .... yes, yes, and YES. Please take my money if these become real skins Riot.

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}

i dont like cassiopeia's skins, they're so ugly =/

hope one of these gets chosen
Too bad cass is least played mage in game she gets no love
Maybe, but people forget how strong she can be just because she got nerfed a bunch
Yeah with a decent lead she can do very well,but after rip mana pots

It's actually very easy to get a lead with her

Don't take her mid vs a poke mage or assassin, this is where people get the misconception that she's awful now because these are the very people designed to destroy her! Although cocky {{champion:238}} and{{champion:91}} are actually not too hard to fight

Take her top with TP or Exhaust. TP for conservative playstyle, Exhaust vs strong divers. With Exhaust you will straight up win the all-in vs a diving bruiser pre-6. Post 6 it just makes you stronger. Poke but do not overextend because you will run oom

Abuse her consistent ranged poke, never forget to farm and ward. Pick {{item:3070}} or{{item:3027}} NOT BOTH unless you snowball so hard it doesn't matter, get {{item:3116}} immediately afterwards.

My preference, {{item:3070}} {{summoner:12}} because you can trade early while farming, then go back, get tear, then spam all day

Prioritize farm over poke (When I see Cassiopeias do the opposite I cringe), against a safe playing opponent, just hang back and throw out some poison, it's very dangerous for melees to go aggressive vs Cassiopeia early as long as you hang by your minions

As long as you don't misplay, BOOM you'll hit late-game {{champion:69}} and rek everything.

In short: Don't play around her weaknesses, play around her strengths

White snake, with thin red circle marks would be so mesmerizing!

I was with you till White Snake Cassiopia, then I spit-take'd my chocolate milk laughing.
